text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea flemmichii is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to Borneo. S. flemmichii is threatened by habitat loss due to human population expansion.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea flemmichii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33112A9757324. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33112A9757324.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
